        Constructor for Move class. Will initialize the direction and the world for the Move.
        Parameters:
        d - the Direction in which the Entity is supposed to move
        m - MessageRenderer to display messages
        world - the world in which the Move action needs to happen

    • Method Detail

      • act

        public void act​(HPActor a)
        Perform the Move action.

        If it is possible for HPActor a to move in the given direction, tell the world to move them and then reset a's move commands to take into account a possible new set of available Moves. If it is not possible for a to move in that direction, this method does nothing.

        This method will only be called if the HPActor a is alive

        Specified by:
        act in interface HPActionInterface
        Specified by:
        act in class HPAction
        Parameters:
        a - the HPActor who is moving

      • canDo

        public boolean canDo​(HPActor a)
        Returns if or not a HPActor a can perform a Move command.

        This method returns true if and only if a is not dead.

        We assume that actors don't get movement commands attached to them unless they can in fact move in the appropriate direction. If this changes, then this method will need to be altered or overridden.

        Parameters:
        a - the HPActor doing the moving
        Returns:
        true if and only if a is not dead, false otherwise.

      • getWhichDirection

        The Direction of this Move
